name: Catty - A desktop's virtual pet
description:
¡Hello! I'm Exe, an indie dev pretty newbieeeeee ja!
They told me I was crazy, and they were right... 
But I least I can give you a little pet for your desktop :)

Just my lil' friend

It's a prototype but I'm gonna improve it.
Test it, break it and share with me your opinion, if you dare! xD
